appSelection.helperText: Můžete také vložit odkaz nebo ID aplikace a my se ji pokusíme najít.
appSelection.noPlaytime: Váš účet služby Steam nemá u této hry zaznamenanou žádnou odehranou dobu. Toto se může stát, pokud vaše [nastavení soukromí]({{link}}) neumožňují získávání podrobností o hrách, nebo pokud jste se rozhodli nesdílet svou odehranou dobu pomocí přepínače 'Skrýt celkový čas strávený v produktech nezávisle na nastavení výše'. Vaše hlášení vás stále zobrazí jako majitele. Pokud se jedná o chybu, dejte nám prosím vědět.
appSelection.notFound: Nepodařilo se nalézt hru s ID aplikace {{query}}. Toto se může stát, pokud je nepřesné nebo pokud byla hra: odebrána z obchodu, není zapsána jako 'hra' nebo není dostupná ve vaší zemi.
appSelection.notOwner: Na vašem účtu ve službě Steam není tato hra uvedena jako vaše vlastnictví a v přehledu se nezobrazí. Toto se může stát, pokud vaše [nastavení soukromí]({{link}}) neumožňují získávání podrobností o hrách. Pokud se jedná o chybu, dejte nám prosím vědět.
appSelection.placeholder: Zadejte název hry ve vaší knihovně služby Steam...
appSelection.playedNatively: Spustili jste hru nativně bez použití služby Proton?
appSelection.previousReportsExist: Vaše předchozí hlášení u této hry
appSelection.runsNativeWarning: Vybraná hra má nativní verzi pro Linux! Ujistěte se, že jste hru omylem nespustili nativně. Služba Steam ve výchozím nastavení nepoužívá Proton ke spuštění této hry, ale [můžete ji k tomu přinutit]({{link}}).

authoringLanguage.prompt: Ve kterém jazyce budete psát toto hlášení?

batteryPerformance.prompt: Zaznamenali jste nějaké změny pro zlepšení výkonu baterie?

borked.headline: That's a bummer!
borked.intro: You will now proceed with submitting a borked report, but before you do you may want to visit our [Game Troubleshooting FAQ]({{link}}) page.

concludingNotes.label: Concluding Notes
concludingNotes.prompt: Add here anything extra that you'd like to conclude with at the end of your report.

controlLayout.prompt: What control layout did you play with?

controlLayoutCustomization.prompt: Did you customize the controls further?

additionalNotes.label: Further Details
additionalNotes.placeholder: Explanation or link to blog post or Github repository

customizationsUsed.prompt: Are you using any of these common tinkering methods?

device.prompt: Which of your devices are you playing on?

didChangeControlLayout.prompt: Did you change the default control layout?

duration.prompt: For how long have you played?

graphicalFaults.prompt: Did you notice any graphical degradations?

unsure.long: Whatever the game uses by default

graphicsApiSelection.prompt: What graphics API did you use within the game?

controllerNotResponsive.long: Controller(s) detected but were not responsive

inputFaults.prompt: Did you experience any problems with your mouse, gamepad or other input devices?

installs.prompt: Were you able to install the game?

isImpactedByAntiCheat.prompt: Is the game impacted by anti-cheat software?

noWriteWatch.long: Disable support for memory write watches (PROTON_NO_WRITE_WATCH)

launchFlagsUsed.prompt: Do you use any of these Proton launch flags?

launchOptions.label: Launch Options
launchOptions.prompt: Do you set any launch options?

launcher.prompt: How do you launch the game?

localMultiplayerAppraisal.prompt: How would you rate the local multiplayer functionality? Please evaulate for lag, connectivity or input issues, etc.

localMultiplayerAttempted.prompt: Did you try to play multiplayer locally (offline i.e. couch play)?

localMultiplayerPlayed.prompt: Were you able to get local multiplayer to work?

acceptable.long: Acceptable. Moderate issues but can be struggled through.

excellent.long: Excellent. Did not experience any problems.

good.long: Good. Had infrequent issues but is overall playable.

weak.long: Weak. Its problems significantly impact the experience

onlineMultiplayerAppraisal.prompt: How would you rate the online multiplayer functionality? Please evaulate for lag, connectivity or input issues, matchingmaking failures etc.

onlineMultiplayerAttempted.prompt: Did you try to play multiplayer online?

onlineMultiplayerPlayed.prompt: Were you able to connect and play online multiplayer?

opens.prompt: Were you able to start up the game and view its initial menu?

performanceFaults.prompt: Did you experience unexpected slowness given your hardware?

prerequisites.noValidDevices: None of your devices have valid system information

prerequisitesBlock.context: You'll need to log into Steam and provide system information before submitting!
prerequisitesBlock.headline: Not Ready Yet!

notes: Is your system information up to date? You will need to go to your profile and provide your Steam information after a graphics driver update.
Have you selected the correct game? Some games have the same name as older versions i.e. GRID
Have you added descriptions in the right place? For example, write notes about graphics issues in that section rather than end notes.

prompts.continuingDraft: You are continuing from an automatically saved draft.
prompts.discardDraftWarning: All of your responses will be permanently discarded.

additionalNotes.label: Manual Proton Version
additionalNotes.placeholder: Must be valid Proton version string. Examples: {{examples}}

readability.prompt: Was there text in the game that was difficult to read?

errorLoading.long: Could not load a save game

saveGameFaults.prompt: Did you experience any problems with save games?

secondaryLauncher.prompt: Did you have any trouble due to a secondary launch window?

significantBugs.prompt: Did you experience any other significant bugs?

stabilityFaults.prompt: Did you experience any stability issues?

startsPlay.prompt: Were you able to begin playing?

tinkerOverride.prompt: Looks like a non-tinker report so far. Have you made any customizations that would warrant this being a Tinker report? [More info]({{link}})

triedOob.prompt: Your report will be classified as a tinker report. Have you tried playing with Steam and Proton without any tinkering?

official.long: The one Steam recommends by default

variant.prompt: What variant of Proton do you use?

additionalNotes.label: Summary (max {{count}} chars)
additionalNotes.placeholder: Add a short summary. This will be the headline of your report.

verdict.prompt: Would a typical gamer enjoy playing this game on Linux as you've played it?

verdictOob.prompt: Launching straight from Steam, would a typical gamer enjoy playing this game on Linux even without tinkering?

welcome.headline: Welcome
welcome.intro: Thanks for your interest in expanding ProtonDB's catalog of compatibility reports on Steam Play and Proton! Please keep in mind the following before you contribute
notes: Reports are published on ProtonDB to help you, Valve, and developers to help fix games. Please keep your reports accurate, free of offensive language, and refrain from submitting reports just to promote your favorite game, distro or graphics card.

Submitting multiple reports for the same game is encouraged! As you play more or update Proton you'll have more to say. In this way ProtonDB differs from a wiki, since each report serves as a 'snapshot' of how the game played on that date with your configuration.
If you submit multiple reports, only your most recent will count towards the ProtonDB rating and only if your system information meets Proton's minimum requirements.
Your contributions will be publicly visible on ProtonDB and available in data exports under the Open Database License. Go [here]({{link}}) for more information.

switching.long: Could not conventionally escape from fullscreen (such as with Alt-Tab)

windowingFaults.prompt: Did you experience any problems with windowing or fullscreen?
